headers.value: default-src 'self' vercel.live; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://va.vercel-scripts.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com https://vitals.vercel-insights.com; img-src 'self' data: https://www.transparenttextures.com https://*;
